title: Ticket #935: VOMS support breaks gratia due to semantic changes
description: enabling VOMS support (which is on by default) adds extra information to the X509UserProxySubject in the Job Ad. this behavior should be reverted, and instead the VOMS data should be written into two separate attributes. one should have the VOMS data by itself, and the other should have the DN and VOMS data serialized together.
remarks:
2009-Dec-07 07:48:38 by jfrey:
The gridmanager will need to be aware of the new attribute(s) that contains the VOMS data.

2009-Dec-10 21:38:50 by zmiller:
after checkin [16645] the semantics of X509UserProxySubjectName have been restored to pre-7.4.0 behavior, and X509UserProxyFQAN hold the DN and VOMS attributes. there is currently no attribute (or array) that holds VOMS attributes alone.

2009-Dec-14 22:50:01 by zmiller:
after checkin [16661], the Job Ad field "x509userproxysubject" has been restored to normal semantics, and three other fields have been added for voms information:
  • x509UserProxyVOName
  • x509UserProxyFirstFQAN
  • x509UserProxyFQAN

this will only appear in the job ad if voms attributes are present.
